item.description:
Hi All,

Pete would like to climb at Quincy Quarries Saturday morning. All levels of climbers are welcome. Please bring harness, helmet and climbing shoes as well as water and snacks. If you have rope and gear for top rope set up please bring those as well.

Thanks!
Lopa

Hello Everybody, I will be there with a Red Osprey Atmos Backpack at 1100. I should have one or two ropes set up by then. I would appreciate if people brought their ropes. The more climbs the merrier.

If ir rains, I will head to Metrorock instead.

-Pete
item.name: Top Roping at Quincy Quarries
